name: Resident Evil: Launch DEMO (itch)
description:
Game Done

Fine. Finally! Game is done... 8 hour time that i planned... well it isn't. When you play it for first time then it can take you 1-2 hours when you know where to go then at about 15 minutes.
After few testing, adding bonus modes. It will be fully completed and released!

CLICK HERE FOR BLOG! - Download keys for whole 1-1(with new features) chapter.

CLICK HERE FOR TICKET SYSTEM!

Special Offer!

Game is still developing. Get in-develop versions by sharing game. Share it and then send creator links where you shared it. Then you will get your download key.

Features:

RPG system: Level up by killing monsters like zombies, lickers, bosses etc.

Explore: Explore world. Find better guns, money etc.

Shop system: Buy, sell things like guns, herbs...

Main characters: You don't control only one character. You will control more of them!

Controller support: Connect your controller and start playing! so far tested with X360 controller and works brilliant.(not in prototype version will be in full version

Game modes: Unlock different game modes. Campaign, Mercenaries, Bonus Campaign and more!

Game is in develop. Many things can change. If you want to help with develop contact me trough skype: skuciuscz.

I hope I can release completed version with start of summer.

WARNING! You have to download this!: Click here

Achievements NOT COUNTING HERE, PLEASE GO TO FULL REALEASE OF GAME
